main event: A cylindrical object, the size of an airliner, was observed near White Rock Lake, Dallas, Texas on March 30.
interesting points: The object was 75 feet in diameter and showed hovering motion before climbing out., The observation lasted for 4 minutes., The flight path of the object was described as erratic yet smooth., There were previous similar sightings with likely prosaic explanations., The sighting has been documented in Project Blue Book, a historical UFO investigation.
witness description: Civilian age 37, Supervisor of Technical Illustration; Civilian age 38, Service Manager at Royal McBee Typewriter Corp.
